name: The Last Human (dabfredo)
description:
! ATTENTION PLEASE !

The  web version of the game works fine on Chrome but doesn't on Firefox (game loading frozen). Don't know for the other web browsers. 

Gamecodeur GameJam #35

Theme : Zombies

Goal: You're the last hope of humanity and have to cure all infected people

Controls : Use Arrow keys to move "The Last Human"

Credits :

  • Code: myself using Love2D framework https://love2d.org/
  • GFX :
    • Tiles: Pixelad - https://pixellad.itch.io/
      • Hospital Environment Mini Asset Pack https://pixellad.itch.io/hospital-environment-set
      • Hospital Environment Mini Asset - Expansion Pack 1 https://pixellad.itch.io/hospital-environment-mini-asset-expansion-pack-1
    • Sprites: LYASeeK https://lyaseek.itch.io/
      • MiniFolks - Villagers pack https://lyaseek.itch.io/minifvillagers
    • Font: David Jonathan Ross https://www.1001fonts.com/users/djrrb/
      • Bungee https://www.1001fonts.com/bungee-font.html
  • SFX : myself using https://sfxr.me/
  • Music: Eric Skiff - Song Name - Resistor Anthems - Available at http://EricSkiff.com/music
